General.Name: Civitas Social Housing PLC
General.Description: Civitas Social Housing PLC (CSH) was created in 2016 by Civitas Investment Management Limited as the first dedicated London listed REIT to raise long-term, sustainable, institutional capital to invest in care-based social homes and healthcare facilities across the UK. CSH's portfolio has been independently valued at £999.5million (30 September 2022). CSH now provides homes for 4,594 working age adults with long-term care needs, in 697 bespoke properties that are supported by 130 specialist care providers, 18 approved providers and working with over 178 individual local authority partners.
General.Address: 13 Berkeley Street, London, United Kingdom, W1J 8DU
